00012 /*
00013 Commands: 
00014         * Init (calibrate sensors) this will take u from startup to onGround
00015         * takeOff (onGround to takoff states)
00016         * land (position hold to land)
00017         * holdposition (any state to pos hold)
00018         * moveF (time), in seconds, default(0 value equals 1 s, or keep going forward) // all move commands have checking before 
00019         * moveB (time)
00020         * moveR (tim            e)
00021         * moveL (during time)
00022         * moveU (to height) 
00023         * moveD (to height) 
00024         * rotCW (+ x90) (90, or 180, 270)
00025         * rotCCW (same as above)
00026         * Land (but in the functions implementation, make the quad hover around a bit in a square of side length 1 meter or 1 second, then go the middle and land
00027 
00028         
00029 */
